style: * { box-sizing: border-box; } body {margin: 0;}#resumecv-layout{width:100%;max-width:210mm;padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 3px 1px -2px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.14) 0px 2px 2px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12) 0px 1px 5px 0px;}#resumecv-left .resumecv-block{margin-bottom:30px;}#resumecv-content-top{background-image:initial;background-position-x:initial;background-position-y:initial;background-size:initial;background-repeat:initial;background-attachment:initial;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;background-color:rgb(255, 255, 255);padding-right:30px;padding-left:30px;padding-bottom:10px;padding-top:40px;display:flex;}#resumecv-top-info-img{width:65%;}#resumecv-box-ava img{width:100px;}#resumecv-top-info-contact{width:35%;font-size:16px;}#resumecv-content-top .resumecv-block{position:relative;display:flex;}#resumecv-content-top .resumecv-block h1{font-size:35px;margin-top:0px;margin-right:0px;margin-bottom:0px;margin-left:0px;padding-top:0px;line-height:normal;letter-spacing:3px;text-transform:capitalize;font-weight:800;}#resumecv-content-top .job_position{font-size:22px;font-weight:bold;margin-top:15px;letter-spacing:1px;}#resumecv-content-top h1 span{display:block;}.box-name p{overflow-x:hidden;overflow-y:hidden;}#resumecv-content p{margin-bottom:5px;}#resumecv-left .h3{font-size:18px;font-weight:bold;margin-top:0px;text-transform:uppercase;}#resumecv-main .head{font-size:18px;color:rgb(47, 58, 64);padding-bottom:5px;font-weight:bold;margin-top:0px;text-transform:uppercase;}.resumecv-top-bottom{background-image:initial;background-position-x:initial;background-position-y:initial;background-size:initial;background-repeat:initial;background-attachment:initial;background-origin:initial;background-clip:initial;background-color:rgb(255, 255, 255);padding-top:10px;padding-right:30px;padding-bottom:10px;padding-left:30px;display:flex;}.resumecv-top-bottom .head{font-size:18px;color:rgb(47, 58, 64);padding-bottom:5px;padding-top:10px;font-weight:bold;margin-top:0px;text-transform:uppercase;}.resumecv-top-bottom h3{font-weight:normal;font-size:14px;line-height:30px;margin-bottom:10px;color:rgb(51, 51, 51);}#resumecv-content span[contenteditable]{display:inline-block;padding-right:15px;padding-left:15px;}#resumecv-content .row-col-data .row-details{padding-bottom:50px;}#resumecv-left .h3:first-child{margin-top:0px;}.resumecv-box-content{margin-bottom:20px;position:relative;font-size:16px;}#resumecv-main h3{font-weight:normal;font-size:14px;line-height:30px;margin-bottom:10px;color:rgb(51, 51, 51);}#resumecv-box-ava img{padding-top:0px;padding-right:0px;padding-bottom:0px;padding-left:0px;border-top-width:0px;border-right-width:0px;border-bottom-width:0px;border-left-width:0px;border-top-style:initial;border-right-style:initial;border-bottom-style:initial;border-left-style:initial;border-top-color:initial;border-right-color:initial;border-bottom-color:initial;border-left-color:initial;border-image-source:initial;border-image-slice:initial;border-image-width:initial;border-image-outset:initial;border-image-repeat:initial;width:150px;height:150px;}.bar-exp
